original_text: Even three thousand talents of gold, of the gold of Ophir, and seven thousand talents of refined silver, to overlay the walls of the houses withal:
korean_text: 곧 오빌의 금 삼천 달란트와 순은 칠천 달란트라 모든 성전 벽에 입히며

sentences.original_text: Even three thousand talents of gold
and seven thousand talents of refined silver
to overlay walls of houses withal:
